meta.article_title: March 19, 2012 - Fixing the Biggest Weakness in Your Game

biggest-weakness.probleme: Fixing the biggest weakness in your game

debutant.description: Focus on correcting the bad technique, not just developing a decent one

intermediaire.description: Watch videos of yourself playing and compare with top players to identify the weakness
intermediaire.materiel: Table tennis equipment, video recording device

exercices_complementaires.description: Exaggerate the correct technique for a while to ingraining it

metriques_progression.description: Spend extended period of time practicing to undo the bad habit

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Working on just a decent technique
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Replace one bad technique with another, rather than focusing on turning the weakness into a strength
